allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Update AI models to OpenRouter top 10 and add community sharing feature

- Update default model to Kimi K2.5 \(OpenRouter #1 ranked\)
- Add OpenRouter top 10 models \(Kimi K2.5, Gemini 3 Flash, Claude Sonnet 4.5, etc.\)
- Fix model selection persistence across sessions
- Add community sharing feature with Supabase backend
  - Separate ''community'' schema to avoid table limits
  - Row-Level Security \(RLS\) for access control
  - Categories, projects, likes, downloads tables
  - Share modal for local projects
- Add Textarea UI component
- Improve provider auto-selection for OpenRouter models

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
